subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: As English grass gives way to North American hardcourts, will Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal face each other again in the final of the year’s last Grand Slam event: the United States Open.
snippet: As English grass gives way to North American hardcourts, will Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal face each other again in the final of the year’s last Grand Slam event: the United States Open.
